entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow changing to snow mixed with rain near midnight. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023
